nodes.bodyText: Nitpick: can you maybe change the name to something more explicit like ScheduledActionJson ?

+
+import java.time.LocalDateTime;
+import java.util.Optional;
+
+/**
+ * BaseActionJson represents a schedulable action.
+ */
+public class ScheduledRequest {

commit.message:
Merge WebUI Json utility scheduling-related classes

Extract the ScheduleRequest class out of ImageBuildController and use it
in other places. This enforced to change the earliest property to
Optional<LocalDateTime> rather than LocalDateTime.

VirtualPoolsController, even more generic action scheduling code

Extract more of the poolActions() method to reuse for volume-related
actions later on.
